channel.title: Lethium 667/681 help ERROR
channel.description:

item.title: Lethium 667/681 help ERROR
item.dc:creator: @alex321 alex321
item.description:
@alex321 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

The initialize of the server is set to connect to a SQL database. The information for it to connect is invalid now.

static final string port = “3306”;
static final string host = “Localhost”;
static final string db = “Tyluur_db”;
static final string user = “";
static final string pass = "”;
